study_title: Panitumumab versus cetuximab in patients with chemotherapy-refractory wild-type KRAS exon 2 metastatic colorectal cancer (ASPECCT): a randomised, multicentre, open-label, non-inferiority phase 3 study
description: The provided document is an abstract and does not contain a patient demographics table. The information included here is derived from the text in the 'Findings' section, which states the number of patients who received each treatment.
